1370: Alem moved to De Tuyt.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Amalburga at age 25 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Amalburga, Ancelmus, at age 26.
1372: Had a daughter with Amalburga, Truden, at age 27.
1373: Lost son Ancelmus when Ancelmus was 3 years old.
1376: Lost daughter Truden when Truden was 5 years old.
1379: Had a son with Amalburga, Ludingus, at age 34.
1384: Had a son with Amalburga, Thezonus, at age 39.
1389: Became caretaker of Ludingus, Thezonus at age 45.
